EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Hey}}, Win Two Tickets to VMworld 2016!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Take Survey: The State of Enterprise Multi-Cloud II Win 1 of 10 $100 Amazon Gift Cards! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VMT-Vz-state-of-multi-cloud-2]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Our 1st round winner has been chosen! There are now 2 chances left to win 2 Full Conference Passes to VMworld 2016 in fabulous Las Vegas! The epicenter of all things virtual, VMworld is our industry's biggest stage and we want to see you there. The next drawings will be on, June 17th and July 15th. Enter today for your chance to win!
<[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=VMworldSweeps&utm_content=06032016]]> Good Luck! -The VMTurbo Team
